    • setText

      Sets the text of the checkbox.
      Parameters:
      String - text - The new text to be displayed on the checkbox.

    • isChecked

      public boolean isChecked()
      Retrieves the value of the checkbox.
      Returns:
      A Boolean value. true if the checkbox is checked, false if the checkbox is not.

    • getPosition

      public haven.Coord getPosition()
      Retrieves the (top left) position of the checkbox.
      Returns:
      A Coord containing the position of the checkbox.

      Retrieves the size of the checkbox.

      Returns:
